card.description: FBI agents raided a Manhattan building in the fall of 2022 that was allegedly being used as a secret Chinese police station and was staffed with 'illegal cops' who solved crimes.
card.title: FBI raids Manhattan building used as secret Chinese POLICE STATION

_source.content: #China #DeepState #EricAdamsFBI raids Manhattan building used as secret Chinese POLICE STATION by illegal 'cops' to solve crimes: Operation is linked to charity run by Eric Adams donorUK Daily Mail ^ | 13 January 2023 | PAUL FARRELLhttps://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-11633841/FBI-raids-Manhattan-building-used-secret-Chinese-POLICE-STATION-used-illegal-cops.html?ns_mchannel=rss&ns_campaign=1490&ito=1490FBI agents raided a Manhattan building in the fall of 2022 that was allegedly being used as a secret Chinese police station and was staffed with 'illegal cops' who solved crimes.The raid occurred at the headquarters of the American Changle Association, a non-profit that helps Chinese nationals who live in New York. The group's former chairman was Lu Jianshun, who in 2021 donated $4,000 to Eric Adams' mayoral campaign, reports The New York Times.The police station was located on the third floor of the organization's building. The police unit is linked to a unit code named 110 Overseas, based in China's Fujian province.
_source.contentraw:
#China #DeepState #EricAdams
FBI raids Manhattan building used as secret Chinese POLICE STATION by illegal 'cops' to solve crimes: Operation is linked to charity run by Eric Adams donor
UK Daily Mail ^ | 13 January 2023 | PAUL FARRELL
https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-11633841/FBI-raids-Manhattan-building-used-secret-Chinese-POLICE-STATION-used-illegal-cops.html?ns_mchannel=rss&ns_campaign=1490&ito=1490

FBI agents raided a Manhattan building in the fall of 2022 that was allegedly being used as a secret Chinese police station and was staffed with 'illegal cops' who solved crimes.

The raid occurred at the headquarters of the American Changle Association, a non-profit that helps Chinese nationals who live in New York. The group's former chairman was Lu Jianshun, who in 2021 donated $4,000 to Eric Adams' mayoral campaign, reports The New York Times.

The police station was located on the third floor of the organization's building. The police unit is linked to a unit code named 110 Overseas, based in China's Fujian province.

card.title: New York City Mayor Eric Adams to visit El Paso this weekend

_source.content: NYC Mayor Eric Adams to visit El Paso, and beg for mercy: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8qMqilKaN0U -   https://nypost.com/2023/01/13/eric-adams-heads-to-border-says-migrant-crisis-to-now-cost-nyc-2b/ - Mayor Eric Adams is heading to El Paso, Texas this weekend to witness first hand the southern border crisis whose economic hit to the city he now says will be double the $1 billion he had projected. “Our price tag could be anywhere from $1.5 to $2 billion. That’s the price tag that we are facing,” Adams revealed Friday during a Caribbean Power Jam Radio interview. The new double-trouble estimate for New York City is also twice as much as the mayor has previously asked the Joe Biden administration to fork over to help pay for the burden on New Yorkers. “We have to ask ourselves, where we [were] already dealing with a potential $5, $6 billion budget deficit in the outyears. Where does that money come from?” said Adams, a day after he announced cuts to just about every city agency.    “That money comes from our schools. It comes from our public safety, our hospitals, our infrastructure, our ACS services, those are our tax dollars that it’s coming from and we got to see an impact in every service we have in the city,” said Adams.“And that is just inhumane on the part of the national government. And I really believe it’s irresponsible, that we have not had a real national response to what’s happening at our border,” he added.City Hall revealed on Friday that Adams will travel to El Paso, Texas, on Saturday and make multiple stops along the southern border.   [cont.]  #NYC #ElPaso #Texas #Mexico #border #NewYork #USA #Chihuahua #alien #invasion #immigration #migration #immigrant #migrant #refugee #asylum #sanctuary
_source.contentraw:
NYC Mayor Eric Adams
to visit El Paso,
and beg for mercy:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8qMqilKaN0U -

https://nypost.com/2023/01/13/eric-adams-heads-to-border-says-migrant-crisis-to-now-cost-nyc-2b/ -

Mayor Eric Adams is heading to El Paso, Texas this weekend to witness first hand the southern border crisis whose economic hit to the city he now says will be double the $1 billion he had projected.

“Our price tag could be anywhere from $1.5 to $2 billion. That’s the price tag that we are facing,” Adams revealed Friday during a Caribbean Power Jam Radio interview.

The new double-trouble estimate for New York City is also twice as much as the mayor has previously asked the Joe Biden administration to fork over to help pay for the burden on New Yorkers.

“We have to ask ourselves, where we [were] already dealing with a potential $5, $6 billion budget deficit in the outyears. Where does that money come from?” said Adams, a day after he announced cuts to just about every city agency.

“That money comes from our schools. It comes from our public safety, our hospitals, our infrastructure, our ACS services, those are our tax dollars that it’s coming from and we got to see an impact in every service we have in the city,” said Adams.

“And that is just inhumane on the part of the national government. And I really believe it’s irresponsible, that we have not had a real national response to what’s happening at our border,” he added.

City Hall revealed on Friday that Adams will travel to El Paso, Texas, on Saturday and make multiple stops along the southern border.

[cont.]

#NYC #ElPaso #Texas #Mexico #border #NewYork #USA #Chihuahua #alien #invasion #immigration #migration #immigrant #migrant #refugee #asylum #sanctuary

card.description: John Durham, the prosecutor tapped by Attorney General William Barr to investigate how Trump-Russia allegations emerged and spread within federal law enforcement, has already been looking into...
card.title: New Russiagate Prober Has Haunted FBI for Months | RealClearInvestigations

_source.content: 190514#JamesBakerArchivesNew Russiagate Prober Has Haunted FBI for MonthsReal Clear Investigations ^ | 5/14/2019 | Eric Feltenhttps://www.realclearinvestigations.com/articles/2019/05/14/new_russiagate_prober_evidently_has_haunted_fbi_for_months.htmlJohn Durham, the prosecutor tapped by Attorney General William Barr to investigate how Trump-Russia allegations emerged and spread within federal law enforcement, has already been looking into whether the FBI’s former top lawyer, James Baker, illegally leaked to reporters.In fact, the U.S. attorney from Connecticut appears to have begun that work more than seven months ago, to judge from an underreported transcript of an October congressional interview with Baker. The Baker interview, at which Durham was not present, suggests that the prosecutor nevertheless has some people very worried.
_source.contentraw:
190514
#JamesBakerArchives
New Russiagate Prober Has Haunted FBI for Months
Real Clear Investigations ^ | 5/14/2019 | Eric Felten
https://www.realclearinvestigations.com/articles/2019/05/14/new_russiagate_prober_evidently_has_haunted_fbi_for_months.html

John Durham, the prosecutor tapped by Attorney General William Barr to investigate how Trump-Russia allegations emerged and spread within federal law enforcement, has already been looking into whether the FBI’s former top lawyer, James Baker, illegally leaked to reporters.

In fact, the U.S. attorney from Connecticut appears to have begun that work more than seven months ago, to judge from an underreported transcript of an October congressional interview with Baker. The Baker interview, at which Durham was not present, suggests that the prosecutor nevertheless has some people very worried.

_source.content: Video: Herbert Grönemeyer: Mensch – Live - Juni 2003 auf Schalke (Gelsenkirchen) (01:34:07)https://www.3sat.de/kultur/pop-around-the-clock/herbert-groenemeyer-mensch-100.htmlIm Juni 2003 macht die "Das Beste von Gestern bis Mensch"-Tour Station in der Schalke Arena. Im Gepäck hat Herbert Grönemeyer das am meisten verkaufte deutschsprachige Album aller Zeiten.Meine Meinung:Ich werde hier nacheinander alle 24 Konzerte, jeden Tag eines, die am 31.12.2022 auf 3Sat in der Silvesternacht gezeigt wurden, veröffentlichen. Man sind alle bis zum 31.12.2023 anschauen. Vielleicht gefällt euch ja das eine oder andere Konzert.Liebe Leute ich weiß, Hörbi ist politisch gesehen ein linksversiffter  Kotz….. Aber er ist ein begnadeter Musiker. Ich liebe seine Konzerte. Kriege sogar Tränen in den Augen (Ein Stück vom Himmel, Prinzip Hoffnung). Seine Stimme ist sooo geil. Und nicht nur aus Bochum, sondern von vielen Städten in NRW/Deutschland.Hier noch die anderen 23 Konzerte, die ich demnächst hier veröffentlichen möchte oder die ihr euch heute bereits auf 3Sat (Schweiz) ansehen könnt:Die anderen 23 Konzerte aus der Silvesternacht findet ihr hier:Queen, Neil Diamond, Creedence Clearwater Revival, Oasis, Peter Gabriel, Jamiroquai, Laura Marling, Mariah Carey, Chaka Khan, Birdy, Shakira, Casper, Roger Waters (Us and them), Kings of Leon, Biffy Clayro, The black eyed peas, Prince, Ringo Star, Judas Priest, The Progidy, Eric Clapton, Rod Stewart, Bauhaus, Gentlemen, Gustav Peter Wöhlerhttps://www.3sat.de/kultur/pop-around-the-clockHier noch ein Tip. _source.contentraw:
Video: Herbert Grönemeyer: Mensch – Live - Juni 2003 auf Schalke (Gelsenkirchen) (01:34:07)

https://www.3sat.de/kultur/pop-around-the-clock/herbert-groenemeyer-mensch-100.html

Im Juni 2003 macht die "Das Beste von Gestern bis Mensch"-Tour Station in der Schalke Arena. Im Gepäck hat Herbert Grönemeyer das am meisten verkaufte deutschsprachige Album aller Zeiten.

Meine Meinung:

Ich werde hier nacheinander alle 24 Konzerte, jeden Tag eines, die am 31.12.2022 auf 3Sat in der Silvesternacht gezeigt wurden, veröffentlichen. Man sind alle bis zum 31.12.2023 anschauen. Vielleicht gefällt euch ja das eine oder andere Konzert.

Liebe Leute ich weiß, Hörbi ist politisch gesehen ein linksversiffter Kotz….. Aber er ist ein begnadeter Musiker. Ich liebe seine Konzerte. Kriege sogar Tränen in den Augen (Ein Stück vom Himmel, Prinzip Hoffnung). Seine Stimme ist sooo geil. Und ich hasse ihn für das Lied “Heimat ist kein Ort”.

Bochum, ich komm aus dir… Was habt ihr aus Bochum für eine von kriminellen Migranten dominierte Drecksstadt gemacht? Und nicht nur aus Bochum, sondern von vielen Städten in NRW/Deutschland.

_source.content: Just as a heads up for anyone:“S8W” (or, “Second Eighth Week Apostles”) is a creepy cult.They also say, “Why we prophesy Christ.” Prophecy is a Spiritual Gift for use in a church setting and not in public (see 1 Corinthians 12:27-28, 1 Corinthians 14:4 and 1 Corinthians 14:24-25 for more information). Additionally, if one moves up in their ranks, that person eventually attains the title of “apostle”.No thanks. Pass. Will cheerfully do what The Lord says instead. Praying you do the same for your own sake! (Remember: You ultimately affect only you and forever’s a long time.) Feel free to take matters up with The Author if there’s some “problem” with how He writes His Own Book. That 1-on-1 with The Lord happens with 100% of everyone whether he or she “believes that way or not” (see Hebrews 9:27-28). Confidence on the Day of Judgment is critical.But, then again, everyone has a forever as well as a prerogative.Gamble at will.However, don’t forget what Scripture says, and several times at that:“Do not be deceived...”As is, people in THAT particular boat are in the process of being deceived.Tends to make one wonder why people gamble like that.That “S8W” thing isn’t even REMOTELY close, sorry to say. Biblically-speaking, there are no prophets nor are there any apostles today.In New Testament times when 1 Corinthians was written, “prophecy” is what we would say today as “preaching”. “To stand before The Lord and cause His Word to shine” is the initial meaning of the verb “to prophesy”. An “apostle” is one who witnessed the physical ascention of Jesus and was inspired by The Lord to pen the New Testament. The apostle Paul was the lone exception to being an eyewitness to the ascention of Jesus but it’s clearly explained in the book of Hebrews.A “cult” is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong “Jesus”, but that’s another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There’s ALWAYS someone else as a “leader”. Examples: Charles “Taze” Russell of Jehovah’s Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It’s cults which add to Calvary, not The Lord.An incorrect version of “Jesus” exists in ANY cult which includes those “salvation by works” people. It’s totally impossible to “earn a gift”. No “Jesus” in false religions. One doesn’t HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Christianity doesn’t teach anything like either “salvation by works” or “religion” (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with The Lord).By contrast, salvation is “Just Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything”. (“The Gospel message ONLY”, in other words – Keyword: “ONLY”). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We’re under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, He changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren’t robots. Forever’s a long time.Here's the skinny on this “Eric von Anderseck” clown: He’s the self-proclaimed apostle to North America and that if you don’t go through him first, you flat-out did not hear from The Lord.No-brainer. Spooky stuff. According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits.
_source.contentraw:
Just as a heads up for anyone:
“S8W” (or, “Second Eighth Week Apostles”) is a creepy cult.

They also say, “Why we prophesy Christ.” Prophecy is a Spiritual Gift for use in a church setting and not in public (see 1 Corinthians 12:27-28, 1 Corinthians 14:4 and 1 Corinthians 14:24-25 for more information). Additionally, if one moves up in their ranks, that person eventually attains the title of “apostle”.

No thanks. Pass. Will cheerfully do what The Lord says instead. Praying you do the same for your own sake! (Remember: You ultimately affect only you and forever’s a long time.) Feel free to take matters up with The Author if there’s some “problem” with how He writes His Own Book. That 1-on-1 with The Lord happens with 100% of everyone whether he or she “believes that way or not” (see Hebrews 9:27-28). Confidence on the Day of Judgment is critical.
But, then again, everyone has a forever as well as a prerogative.
Gamble at will.
However, don’t forget what Scripture says, and several times at that:
“Do not be deceived...”
As is, people in THAT particular boat are in the process of being deceived.
Tends to make one wonder why people gamble like that.

That “S8W” thing isn’t even REMOTELY close, sorry to say. Biblically-speaking, there are no prophets nor are there any apostles today.
In New Testament times when 1 Corinthians was written, “prophecy” is what we would say today as “preaching”. “To stand before The Lord and cause His Word to shine” is the initial meaning of the verb “to prophesy”. An “apostle” is one who witnessed the physical ascention of Jesus and was inspired by The Lord to pen the New Testament. The apostle Paul was the lone exception to being an eyewitness to the ascention of Jesus but it’s clearly explained in the book of Hebrews.

A “cult” is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong “Jesus”, but that’s another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There’s ALWAYS someone else as a “leader”. Examples: Charles “Taze” Russell of Jehovah’s Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It’s cults which add to Calvary, not The Lord.

An incorrect version of “Jesus” exists in ANY cult which includes those “salvation by works” people. It’s totally impossible to “earn a gift”. No “Jesus” in false religions. One doesn’t HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Christianity doesn’t teach anything like either “salvation by works” or “religion” (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with The Lord).

By contrast, salvation is “Just Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything”. (“The Gospel message ONLY”, in other words – Keyword: “ONLY”). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We’re under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, He changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren’t robots. Forever’s a long time.

Here's the skinny on this “Eric von Anderseck” clown: He’s the self-proclaimed apostle to North America and that if you don’t go through him first, you flat-out did not hear from The Lord.

No-brainer. Spooky stuff. According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits.

group.description: What kinds of events does the bible say we will see in the last days?  Can we see those events in today's news?  In this age of deception, can we even trust anything we hear on the news?  We're not about how many people we can get into our group here.  We have no interest in being a group that is 5 miles wide and 2 inches deep.  In this group, you're going to hear things that 95% of today's average Christians may not understand because dealing with it would make them uncomfortable and today's average American Christian desires comfortable Christianity above all else.  That is because today's church is under very deep deception that Jesus told us to watch closely for in the last days.   If you are looking for deeper insights on where we really are on the prophetic timeline, then this may be a group you want to join.   If you are waiting to be raptured away before the tribulation begins, just before the real Christians will likely have to suffer persecution for their faith, you probably won't want to join this group.  ALL POSTING IN THIS GROUP SHOULD relate directly to last days events as prophesied in the Bible and ALL LINKS MUST HAVE AT LEAST A SHORT DESCRIPTION OF WHAT IS BEING LINKED TO.  All posts that do not relate directly to final days events as prophesied in the bible will be removed.  Haters/disrespecters will be banned, as will pretentious theological pontificators seeking to argue every nuance of every post.
group.title: Are We In The Final Days?

TRUST GARLAND?
[SC = BLOCKADE]
[SC = loss of FBI command/control safeguard]
Q ... ???

So far, Eric Garland has done all the right things to progress the PLAN of Trump being the bait to take matters into precedent setting territory.
Without for example, the Mar-a-lago raid, classified documents would not be a trending issue.

Same goes for taxes, which Trump fought all the way to the SC, setting the precedent for others in DC to be scrutinized just as hard.

Now Garland appoints a Trump era special council? "Trump era" by no means makes this guy trustworthy. And there is the media side, gleefully it would appear assisting to throw Biden under the bus.

It makes me wonder what measures Trump has in place to ride the 25th amendment wave, which the Dems would have planned to relieve Biden of the WH just in time to continue covering their tracks with other issues.
Remembering that Trump specifically mentioned quite some time back, that the Dems 25A playbook would backfire on Biden. He said, "Be careful what you wish for"...

My question is, what methods has Trump put in place to gain most control?

I'm going to refer to Q in speculative possible answers.
In 2019, Q mentioned the year of the Boomerang. We can now clearly see that in fact 2023 is the year of the boomerang. We see a reverse image of R's in the house, about to start investigations and impeachments, just as the D's did in 2018 when they retook the house. (as a side note, the Senate is the key, we saw how effectively the R's managed under Trump to use the Senate in keeping D's from being effective. Will the next 2 years be go slow investigations until 2024 senate majority along with Trump win? We will see. Something may still change in the Senate during this coming mid-term?)

Returning to the Boomerang. Garland is now in the BOOMERANG role of Sessions. Is Garland a "Sleeper", or are there White Hat Sleepers infiltrating Bidens administration, planted in similar fashion as Rod Rosenstein was in Trumps White House? Now that a Special Council is appointed to look into Biden, are we watching a Mueller style Boomerang? Will Garland be forced to "RECUSE" himself?

Very interdasting times ahead frens. Let's keep eyes locked on the moves and counter moves behind the scenes, rather than be caught up in the optics.
Considering Q has been over the target with so many intel drops, let us not forgo the probability of the fireworks to come should these guys be on the level, by simply being the very "GOOD ACTORS" playing their parts extremely well.

ENJOY THE SHOW...

Only those who actually do the will of my Father in heaven will enter. On judgment day many will say to me, ‘Lord! Lord! We prophesied in your name and cast out demons in your name and performed many miracles in your name.’ But I will reply, ‘I never knew you. Get away from me, you who break God’s laws.’”2 TIMOTHY 3:5 (NLT)They will act religious, but they will reject the power that could make them godly. Stay away from people like that!https://www.biblegateway.com/A “cult” is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong “Jesus”, but that’s another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There’s ALWAYS someone else as a “leader”. Examples: Charles “Taze” Russell of Jehovah’s Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It’s cults which add to Calvary, not The Lord.An incorrect version of “Jesus” exists in ANY cult which includes those “salvation by works” people. It’s totally impossible to “earn a gift”. No “Jesus” in false religions. One doesn’t HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Christianity doesn’t teach anything like either “salvation by works” or “religion” (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with The Lord).By contrast, salvation is “Just Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything”. (“The Gospel message ONLY”, in other words – Keyword: “ONLY”). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We’re under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, He changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren’t robots. Forever’s a long time.According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits.Over the years, there has been quite a lot taught about Christianity. The problem is, many of those things simply are not in The Bible. Makes one wonder at times - Human opinion versus The Lord’s opinion...Wonder who would win? Additionally, Mosaic Law and/or other types of Legalism - Sad, huh? One thing to also remember is that there are dozens of each, cults and false religions. Many of them have done a SPECTACULAR job of messing up the Gospel message with either bogus teachings, fake literature based on fake Bibles and so on.Sometimes love must be tough. The desire is for everyone to hit as close to 100% as possible of everything for which The Lord created that person, self included. No one is perfect and there is no one righteous...AT ALL (Isaiah 64:6, John 8:7, Romans 3:10-12, Romans 3:21-26). EVERYONE needs a savior (1 John 1:8-10). As long as a person is able to identify from the heart with the death, burial and resurrection of Jesus...ONLY...that person is justified (Galatians 2:20-21, Romans 5:10, Romans 6:5, 2 Corinthians 5:17). Anything above and beyond that is merely some human attempting to push some “religion”, or “sin management”, or “man-plan”. (SIDE NOTE – The term “Christ” is a title, not a name. It means either “The Anointed One” or “Messiah”.)Rather than ask, “What would Jesus do?” Perhaps instead inquire as to what He may be doing in you. It’s more accurate and allowing Him to live in you is more feasible than merely trying to imitate behavior(s).“...and the truth shall set you free” (John 8:31-32). (Proverbs 3:5-6, Proverbs 27:17, Hebrews 4:12, Hebrews 10:14, Jude 1:23, etc. are additional motives.)Psalm 118:8 implies that it’s better to trust in The Lord than it is to put confidence in man.“To sanctify” means “to set apart”. “To put to its intended purpose,” in other words.In Hebrews 10:14, “For all time” means (may I have a drumroll, please) “For all time”. (That’s spiritually-speaking, or course. The rest of you? Welcome to being human.)(ANOTHER SIDE NOTE – In some translations, “For all time” is worded as “Forever”, “To the end” or “For eternity”.)

MATTHEW 7:21-23 (NLT)
“Not everyone who calls out to me, ‘Lord! Lord!’ will enter the Kingdom of Heaven. Only those who actually do the will of my Father in heaven will enter. On judgment day many will say to me, ‘Lord! Lord! We prophesied in your name and cast out demons in your name and performed many miracles in your name.’ But I will reply, ‘I never knew you. Get away from me, you who break God’s laws.’”
2 TIMOTHY 3:5 (NLT)
They will act religious, but they will reject the power that could make them godly. Stay away from people like that!
https://www.biblegateway.com/

A “cult” is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong “Jesus”, but that’s another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There’s ALWAYS someone else as a “leader”. Examples: Charles “Taze” Russell of Jehovah’s Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It’s cults which add to Calvary, not The Lord.

An incorrect version of “Jesus” exists in ANY cult which includes those “salvation by works” people. It’s totally impossible to “earn a gift”. No “Jesus” in false religions. One doesn’t HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Christianity doesn’t teach anything like either “salvation by works” or “religion” (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with The Lord).

By contrast, salvation is “Just Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything”. (“The Gospel message ONLY”, in other words – Keyword: “ONLY”). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We’re under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, He changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren’t robots. Forever’s a long time.

According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits.

Over the years, there has been quite a lot taught about Christianity. The problem is, many of those things simply are not in The Bible. Makes one wonder at times - Human opinion versus The Lord’s opinion...Wonder who would win? Additionally, Mosaic Law and/or other types of Legalism - Sad, huh? One thing to also remember is that there are dozens of each, cults and false religions. Many of them have done a SPECTACULAR job of messing up the Gospel message with either bogus teachings, fake literature based on fake Bibles and so on.

Sometimes love must be tough. The desire is for everyone to hit as close to 100% as possible of everything for which The Lord created that person, self included. No one is perfect and there is no one righteous...AT ALL (Isaiah 64:6, John 8:7, Romans 3:10-12, Romans 3:21-26). EVERYONE needs a savior (1 John 1:8-10). As long as a person is able to identify from the heart with the death, burial and resurrection of Jesus...ONLY...that person is justified (Galatians 2:20-21, Romans 5:10, Romans 6:5, 2 Corinthians 5:17). Anything above and beyond that is merely some human attempting to push some “religion”, or “sin management”, or “man-plan”. (SIDE NOTE – The term “Christ” is a title, not a name. It means either “The Anointed One” or “Messiah”.)

Rather than ask, “What would Jesus do?” Perhaps instead inquire as to what He may be doing in you. It’s more accurate and allowing Him to live in you is more feasible than merely trying to imitate behavior(s).

“...and the truth shall set you free” (John 8:31-32). (Proverbs 3:5-6, Proverbs 27:17, Hebrews 4:12, Hebrews 10:14, Jude 1:23, etc. are additional motives.)

Psalm 118:8 implies that it’s better to trust in The Lord than it is to put confidence in man.

“To sanctify” means “to set apart”. “To put to its intended purpose,” in other words.
In Hebrews 10:14, “For all time” means (may I have a drumroll, please) “For all time”. (That’s spiritually-speaking, or course. The rest of you? Welcome to being human.)
(ANOTHER SIDE NOTE – In some translations, “For all time” is worded as “Forever”, “To the end” or “For eternity”.)
